评论详情: Hugs waistline and bust for flattering shape, fabric and fit are very comfortable, love this dress! Rating 4 and not 5 stars because the tie in the front is odd, I'm planning on cutting it so will be all good. True to pictured color and size.
I really like this dress. Nice quality fabric and good fit.

评论概述: Love it. Comfy. Easy to wash.
评论详情: This is the second of these I bought and this one has slightly bigger armholes, which is nice. I wear the heck out of these and they put up with it- I have one I've been wearing 5 years. The only part that causes problems is the decorative strings- if you don't carefully tie them up in a rubber band or something they turn into a big messy knot in the washing machine. That's a tiny complaint.
Nice dress, but did shrink after putting it in the dryer

评论概述: Cute but only lasts one wear
评论详情: Wore once, loved it, lots of compliments.  Washed once per the instructions and dress is ruined.  Shrunk up (not in) to the point it is unbearable

I'm 5'2, around 160lbs size L dress fits nicely. Length is long enough for short girls. It's has thin breathable fabric. It's has sewn in underdress so it's not see through. Overall satisfied with this purchase.

评论概述: Came apart in the wash after 3 wears
评论详情: Unfortunately this pretty dress was poor quality and came apart in the wash after 3 wears. I had it for about a month before it unraveled at the waist seam. Never had my washer hurt any of my clothes before in the years I've had it. I'd be willing to change my review if they replace this item.  It's a real bummer than it came apart on me.
Purchased the Champagne dress. Washed once in cold water, hung to dry. Flowers bled all over the dress. Very poor quality. Super disappointed.
The print is really beautiful and the color is exactly as pictured but the material is very cheap and transparent.

The pattern & color are just as pictured. I love it, and it will be perfect for my trip. I'm am only 5'2", so it hits me at my ankle. I will have to hem it a couple inches. I normally wear an xl.. but I ordered a XXL cus it's linen and no give in the breast area. We'll it is a bit loose, but I think once I wash it it'll be perfect.
Wonderful fit! Very pretty dress! I would not wear this without an undershirt, but otherwise it’s perfect.

I love this dress because I can look put together with minimal effort, which is great for a mom. It’s been easy to nurse my son in too, so I’m considering getting it in multiple colors. Flattering cut and very comfortable. Fabric wrinkles easily, but it only takes two minutes to steam it and then I’m ready to walk out the door.
Fits perfectly love love love the material perfectly made THANK YOU.
Such a great fit true to size
This dress looked amazing in the pictures before I bought it when it arrived it was so wrinkled up that it looked like a piece of rag had been thrown in a bag not worth the money

I love this dress! I initially bought Floral 14 and the green was a little darker than pictured, but still bright. It feels great, not to sheer with the built in lining for the front body, and it runs true to their size chart. I loved it so much that I ordered Navy 1. The picture is a bright navy, so I was disappointed when it came and is almost black. It is the correct floral colors, so it is what they call Navy 1. The other reason I gave it  a 4 is that the button loops are tiny elastic loops that are hard to button.
She wears it all the time and it's so pretty on her!!
The dress does not look the same as the pictures. The fabric is thinner, buttons are not in a straight line, and seams are not as pictured.
Tons of compliments whenever I wear it

The dress came soaked in an awful smelling chemical that burned my eyes when I opened the bag. No area on the dress was dry. It was so saturated that when I took it out to figure out what was wrong, the shirt I was wearing got wet and stained from whatever was on the dress. Return immediately

The material is super thin. You would need a tank top and slip underneath to prevent a peep show. I loved the print. I chose the white one with the palm trees and flamingos. I will return the item due to the quality of the fabric. For the price, it's not worth it. I've bought better quality dresses at Marshall's or TJMAXX.
Arrived promptly. Looks just the picture.

A size large fit me perfectly. If you have a larger bust, I would go up a size. The fabric quality of this dress was better than expected and is a nice light weight material for summer.  Wrinkles easily steam out within minutes. Color is as expected and it is a nice flowy dress. Very happy with this purchase!!!

I LOVE this dress! Style is very flowing and the material is very soft. It recommended dry cleaning, but I hand washed it in cold water, wrung it in a towel, and hung it up dry. It came out beautiful! The 3/4 sleeves are great to hide your upper arms if you want to. I’m 5’6” and 212 lbs, so that’s important to me. The only tiny problem I had, was that the elastic on the waist was a little higher than my actual waist, but it still DID NOT sit under my boobs, so it’s ok. I’m considering buying another in a tiny print.
Looks nice, but the wrong pattern/color was sent.
Runs big
Comfortable dress, the sleeves are just fitting.  And it’s long for us shirt people.
Very cheap looking dress. Poor quality. Don’t waist your money.
The dress fit me great, loved the large skirting and the way it flowed. Price was perfect. Sleeves were straight and tight I wish they were larger like the skirting.
I really like the dress and it fit well. However it is dry clean only and it is so wrinkled it looks like it has been slept in for a week. The fabric is rayon which adds to my distress.

评论概述: Super cute, but not meant for big busted women!
评论详情: The dress is adorable and is true to its size, however I’m a medium in dresses but am a 36 DD. The dress itself fit beautifully, but the buttons around the bust area were nearly bursting at the seams. I am going to use a nude tank top so I’m able to unbutton them and make it work, but big busted ladies, take that into consideration before purchasing :)

This was just as gorgeous in person as the pictures. The fit is perfect, a huge plus when your nearly 6' tall! It's very well made. I can dress it up or down. It works as a single vacation dress easily. I'm pleased with it and would recommend.
Wore this for a wedding in South Carolina in June! It was soft and lightweight! The colors were nice and bright! Good choice!
Very flattering and comfortable. Top buttons unbutton but the rest are sewn. Perfect for breastfeeding! I'm 5'3" and the dress sits at my ankles. Would buy again!
Love the fit and lenght
Every thing about it is wonderful
I love this dress.  Fits as expected and super cute.  Lots of compliments when I wear it.
Beautiful dress wrong  size in the bust area

This fit me perfectly. I am 5‘,5“ around 120 pounds. The nice thing about the navy with cherries pattern is that the wrinkles don’t stand out too much but there are a lot of wrinkles after washing and the under skirt wrinkles to the point it can be a little uncomfortable unless I take more time to straighten it out/iron.

I got the dark blue with flowers. The flowers were not as bright in person, the draw string is just for show, only the top and very bottom buttons are real and it just didn't do my figure any favors. If the draw string was actually adjustable it would have been the dress.
Did not look like the picture. Not flowy at all and the puckering isn't pictured and was very unflattering
Fit perfect. Love the colors in it. Not real long which was perfect. Fell about mid calf.
Looks nice on! I thought the tie looked strange so I carefully snipped it off. It’s a comfortable and pretty dress - as good as can be expected for the price. I recommend.
This dress was way better than I expected! It fits nicely, is so comfortable and it’s so pretty!  I am excited to wear it at a upcoming event.
Likes: color, style, light weight fabric, the compliments from others. Dislikes: I am a little big chested thus some of the front buttons gap a little. Wore a tank under it so no issues.
Love love love this dress! I have gotten so many compliments when I wear it. It is flowing and comfortable! I did cut off the weird tassel thing on the front though. One of my favorite dresses!

评论概述: Color and print as pictured, but skirt much less full
评论详情: True navy blue, not too dark, with a pretty print, just as pictured.  Disappointed that the skirt is about 1/2 as full as pictured.  I'll be able to wear it, but hate false advertising.  Size was right for my 44" bust/35" waist and 44" hips.  Fabric is very thin, but not see-through.
The dress is of a very light material, but not see through, it is ver comfortable and flattering.

My chest is 38D, I purchased a medium, and the buttons in the bust area are a bit strained. However, it's not terribly noticeable and I like the fit overall. I'm very happy with the material and the quality of the dress overall.
Be sure you have a slender waist to look your best!
Material is nice. Colors what I wanted. Comfortable fit.
The cooler is true to picture.  The fabric flows nicely to make it very comfortable .
I enjoy joy the fit, design and style.
Size ran small … ordered my usual Size.
Cute. True to size. I will purchase more styles by this manufacturer.

I purchased this dress and wore it today. The dress is very pretty and appears well-made. I had a lot of compliments. My only complaint is the length, it is very long. I’m 5’4.5”, it goes to my ankles.
A wedding in September will be beautiful thank you

The material was great! The colors were awesome. It was well made. It didn't fit me in the upper torso at all, and there's no stretch or give in the shoulders area, so it has to kinda fit right. Also, the pics show a nicely tucked stretchy area above the waist, and yes, it's there, but it's too loose. If I got a small, it would no way fit my shoulders and chest, so I can't wear this outfit.

Nice dress. Even with me being on the shorter  size the length is perfect. I can wear it with flats to the grocery store or dress it up with some jewelry and a higher heel to go out for dinner at night.
Nice quality with beautiful print but, not great for large busted ladies. Sadly, I had to return it because my girls didn't fit properly.

I liked the feel of the fabric right out of the bag. The small fit, but with Ds on my chest, it absolutely did not suit. The medium fits, I will just stitch the button panel closed so it does not gap. As other reviewer‘s note, the white tie is very stupid. It was pretty easy to trim off. I’m 5’ 3” and the medium does not quite touch my shoes, which is good because I find maxi dresses unsanitary

评论概述: For a long torso figure, the waist band sat right under my chest.
评论详情: Nice dress over all. But I had to return in due to the fact the waist band for me was right under my chest which did not look correct on my and, the color was darker than I expected. Dissapointed wanted this dress to work as I really liked it.

I ordered a medium & it fit perfectly.  Everyone complemented on dress.  I figured to wash in gentle cycle.  Dress did not have washing instructions.  Though most delicate materials are in cold water & delicate cycle.
It’s too small

评论概述: Comfy and pretty for summer into fall
评论详情: The little random string trying to be a boho feature was weird and unnecessary

This was my second dress from the company. The first one didn't have a liner like this one does. The liner in the chest area was bulky feeling. The "V" neck was bunched up and my boobs didn't like the way they looked. It was almost like I should have been two cups larger to fill out the chest area. Same size as my first dress, just the liner.
Very pretty , but not meant for me. Had to return it
It needs to be ironed which I’m very sad about! I don’t like to iron! Otherwise it’s very pretty and I really like the style!
Pretty color fits 👍
Great Dress
I returned it.  I decided I didn't want it.  It's a thin material.

评论概述: Wash constantly, no change in material
评论详情: Looks fresh and fits perfect every time after washing. Light weight, so comfortable but looks classy
Nice dress. Wrong color
The sleeves are too small for that size dress.
It looks so much better in picture but not as per my taste .
Received tons of compliments on it. I am a 2x sized person..the arms were a bit snug but I have heavy arms.

I think I messed up and left a review for a different company under this dress.  Sorry to have done it because this dress is fantastic!  Light, pretty, comfortable, drapes perfectly . . . and it's covered in cherries.  What more could we ask of a summer dress?  Not a thing.
I like the fabric. However, it is a bright pink and has a short liner underneath, from the waist, which adds a lot of bulk to the way it hangs.

评论概述: Not a full button up dress.
评论详情: Size ran small only due to the front being sewn shut. While buttons run the full length of the dress, only three open at the bodice, it's sewn shut for about a foot and then it has working buttons to the hem. The lack of room to get into and out of the dress put it at a 4 star vs 5 star. The string at the front is just a string that's been sewn on. The waistband is stretchy. Fabric is pretty good and matches the product image.
Love this dress!
I like the lightweight material of the dress for summer wear but the size was too small above the waist.
Love this dress the built-in slip is fantastic.
Poor quality, poor fit, looks cheap.
The dress was stuffed into my mail box in the original clear plastic bag. I am really disappointed in the delivery of my purchase.
This was my second purchase of this dress in a different style.  I love it and it looks good. Very comfortable. Just wish it had pockets.
This was supposed to be for a wedding.  The sewing is crooked and not pieces together correctly.  Can't even wear it.
Very nice dress
This dress is so lovely.  I am in a weight loss program and it is too big for me.  But it is a very nice dress.
The bust could be a little bigger

评论概述: Pretty fabric but not flattering on me
评论详情: I liked the pattern and fabric of this dress but even the small looked a little big on me - Kind of overwhelmed my short frame 5'2". Just now a flattering fit.
Little tight
Runs very small. Sleeves should have been flutter sleeve in order to fit. Disappointed because I liked the style and material pattern.

It’s a nice dress, very comfortable and looks good, but it has a “cheap” feel to it when you look closer.  The hem is just serged and not hemmed properly (why would they do that???). Also the hem is decidedly uneven, with the front and back of the dress being the same, and the sides of the dress several inches longer.  I guess you get what you pay for.
Great fit, I love it!
I didn’t return because of weight I’m losing hoping to fit in it soon, it’s very tight in the arms and chest, the dress is lovely looking though

Very pretty rayon fabric.  I ordered the white with blue lilies on it, and the front of the bodice was lined, and there was a skirt lining that went to just above the knee - nice features.  I ordered based on the size chart (my bust measurement was an inch smaller than what was on the chart), but the dress was far too tight in the bust, and it pulled badly.  On the dress I received, all the buttons were functional except for those between the waist and just above the knee.  The "drawstring" was just a cord stitched at the waistline; had I kept the dress, I would have removed it.  I am nearly 5'4" and the dress was nearly to the ground.

评论概述: Fabric stains with water and the print smears…
评论详情: I ordered the light pink version of the dress (as seen in the photos). The dress arrived wrinkled from shipping, no problem I have a steamer. The water droplets from the steamer stained the dress… tried to use a tide pen which made the stain worse. I wore the dress out hoping no one would notice the stains (second picture) and after about 30 minutes noticed smears of the dark green and blue from the print… everywhere on the pink parts of the dress! I wasn’t sweating or anywhere near anything wet or moist. The print just was smearing everywhere. I’m pretty sad because the dress was very comfortable and it’s super cute but now looks like a worn out hand me down from wearing it one time… definitely returning.
It was a lovely dress. I wore it for Easter. It shrunk in the wash... followed all the care directions.
Perfect for hot days! Get ready for lots compliments!
